abstract: Federal Judge Catherine Eagles blocks part of a North Carolina law that would require a medical worker to offer to display an ultrasound image of a fetus to a pregnant woman and let her to listen to the heartbeat.
snippet: A federal judge has blocked a part of a law that required a medical worker to offer to display an ultrasound image of a fetus to a pregnant woman and let her to listen to the heartbeat.
lead_paragraph: A federal judge has blocked a part of a law that required a medical worker to offer to display an ultrasound image of a fetus to a pregnant woman and let her to listen to the heartbeat.

headline.main: North Carolina: Part of Abortion Law Is Blocked
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Part of Abortion Law Is Blocked
headline.seo: Part of Abortion Law in North Carolina Is Blocked
